39.eng-name: The Book on the Description of Hellfire
39.ara-name: كتاب صفة جهنم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Imran bin Husain narrated that the Messenger Of Allah (s.a.w) said:" I looked into the Fire and I saw that most of its people are women, and I looked into Paradise and I saw that most of its people were the poor." Other chains report similar narrations

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ أَكْثَرَ أَهْلِ النَّارِ النِّسَاءُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Most of the Inhabitants of the Fire Being Women
